name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with a robust background in Generative AI and Prompt Engineering, leveraging 10+ years of experience in software development to create high-performance solutions. Adept at Content Creation and Expert Acquisition, I understand the intricacies of Auditing and Chat Moderation within AI contexts. Proficient in delivering impactful results while working remotely in a collaborative environment. My strong command of Advanced English enhances my communication capabilities, essential for Teaching and providing effective Feedback in tech-driven projects.

Alongside my AI expertise, I possess extensive knowledge in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter**, with practical experience across the full stack using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have successfully built and deployed cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, leading enterprise platform development that incorporates AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making. My background in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation ensures the creation of secure, maintainable solutions that comply with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Furthermore, I bring hands-on MLOps experience—from developing ML pipelines to managing production workflows—utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Driven by a passion for building systems that deliver substantial real-world impact.
